Texts.Chs: 把^orange;离心机^reset;带回^orange;科学前哨站^reset;给^green;我^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;Centrifuge^reset; to the ^green;annoying guy^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 如果你想提升你的实验成功率，我建议你建造一台^orange;离心机^reset;。没有它，你便不能升级到^green;高级离心机^reset;，没有高级离心机，你就没法生产出高端的可裂变材料，你可以在你的^orange;能源建造机^reset;中制造它。所以，快去制作一台^orange;离心机^reset;并带给我。
Texts.Eng: If you want to advance your lab, you are going to want ^orange;a centrifuge^reset;. Without one, you can't get ^green;an advanced centrifuge^reset; to produce high-end fissionable materials. Make a ^orange;centrifuge^reset; in a ^orange;Power Station^reset; and bring it to me.

Texts.Chs: 真的很棒。谢谢你的帮助。这是给你的奖励。
Texts.Eng: When you are able to, ^green;upgrade to an advanced centrifuge^reset; to really step up your lab game!
